an3.100:2.2: Bhavitakaya is explained in MN 36 as ability to endure pain, and also in the same sense at Pe 2. See BB’s note for emendation to dukkhavihari.
an3.100:4.1: At Chāndogya Upaniṣad 6.13.1–2, Uddālaka questions Śvetaketu about a lump of salt in a bowl; the taste of salt pervades all just as the self pervades all.
an3.100:10.3: This sutta has a breathtakingly cynical view of the justice system.
